entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High 16. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2 with risk of frost. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing overnight. Low plus 2 with risk of frost. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Saturday 28 May 2016
